name: "The Aglaea” Handmade Luxury Embellished Gypset Leather handbag
description:
“The Aglaea” meaning the Goddess of Beauty & Splendour !!!

Bags for your inner Goddess from the GreenEyeRocks Embellished luxury Leather Bag Range AW/13.
Often described as Rock ‘n’ Roll Boho this stunning bag is like a beautiful piece of jewellery and is One of a Kind!

I only use high quality unusual materials.

Each bag takes a week to complete and every bag is different.

The Handle is removable so that it can be used as a Clutch bag too.

I do bespoke orders too so please convo me if you are interested.

•	Dimensions are 27cm Wide and Height is 26cm,they fit a nice amount I use mine for a large wallet, Ipad Mini and medium sized make up bag comfortably.

Bag is shown on a model that is a UK size 8 so looks slightly larger, the handle size i designed to fit snugly under your arm for security and to avoid weighing you down.


Bag Materials

• Genuine Light Tan Leather, matching zip. Machine finished for security.
• Handle - Silver plated 7mm heavy duty Box Chain threaded with Cobalt Blue detailing,the handle itself is removable as it is attached through Rivets by chunky Silver Split rings.
• Attached to the handle are handmade Suede Tassels on Jump rings in Cobalt Blue, like Key Rings they can again be detached, they are colour matched to the embellishment on the bag.
• Zip Pull is a stunning large Lump of Natural Point Quartz Crystal.


Embellishment

• The main part of this bag has a V of Gunmetal coloured metal detailing with chains and low hanging coins, with a dangling centre piece that has poms poms in bright orange attached. Although it has a lot of detailing It is however light and not too noisy it is a pretty noise like belly dancing coins.
• Above this is special handwoven embroidery in Cobalt Blue, red, Green yellow.
• Specially designed & hand cut non-shed Cobalt blue Glitter Fabric that has been piped with green edging.
•At the sop there are more glitter cut shapes and more handwoven embroidery and at the very top a strip of Olivine Green and black Hair on hide, very unusual.


Other Details

•	Bag comes protected in a lovely green Cotton Dust bag Cover.

• The bag is unlined the quality of the leather inside is very good and allows for more room internally.

• The Handles are sturdy but the heavier & the bulkier the stuff is inside will cause the shape of the bag to alter in terms of how the embellishment will lie, if this is a problem for you careful placement of the contents will sort it out.

• Care - The leather itself is high quality and durable and embellishment is hand stitched and glued for extra security but that said these bags should be treated with love so they continue to sparkle brightly. Should a disaster occur I do offer a repair service, which is important for one off items.
TAKE CARE ON THIS ONE FOR SNAGGING XOXO



PLEASE NOTE POSTAGE MAY SEEM HIGH ON THESE & SHOES BUT IT IS THE NATURE OF THE PRODUCT THEY HAVE TO BE TRACKED AND INSURED BECAUSE THEY ARE A ONE OFF AND A HIGHER PRICE IT PROTECTS BOTH OF US , ON THE PLUS SIDE IT MEANS YOU GET YOUR PARCEL WITHIN 8 DAYS, ALSO I PAY A PORTION OF THE FEE MYSELF IT IS NORMALLY AROUND £17 - £19 DEPENDING ON WEIGHT.


Please also note that colours vary so much from device to device.

Designs, text and Photos © Green Eye Rocks Ltd , 2005 - 2013 - "All rights reserved"

name: Handmade Wide Leather & Glitter Friendship Statement Cuff With Repurposed Vintage Rhinestone
description:
This Cuff was designed and made to go with " The Aglaea" Luxury bag and shoes.

Stunning Hand Made Extra wide Friendship cuff made of high quality 2mm thick Veg Tan leather, that is topped with Non Shed Cobalt blue Glitter Fabric edged with Cobalt and dark Teal edging. 
This was embroidered with a lovely handwoven friendship bracelet, it has a repurposed Vintage  Rhinestone centre piece it also has Swarovski elements stones in Olivine Green to match the Hair on Hide on the bag,  It also has a few small Olivine Swarovski crystals dotted around the bracelet.

The fastening comprises of 2  sturdy but comfortable gold plated hook fastenings to hold it nice and flat to the wrist.

Bracelet length is 17.6 cm inc the clasps,  cuff width is 4.5cm, My wrist measure in at 16cm but this cuff still fits well but is a little loose better than too tight!. A little bit of give is good to be able do up and unhook clasps easily. 

STILL NOT YOUR SIZE ? It can be extended more Just convo me to let me know how much.

--------

--------

name: "The Euphrosyne” Handmade Luxury Embellished Leather Boho Designer Bag.
description:
“The Euphrosyne” meaning the Goddess of Joy!!

Bags for your inner Goddess from the GreenEyeRocks Embellished luxury Leather Bag Range AW/13.
Often described as Rock ‘n’ Roll Boho this stunning bag is like a beautiful piece of jewellery and is One of a Kind!

I only use high quality unusual materials.

Each bag takes a week to complete and every bag is different.

The Handle is removable so that it can be used as a Clutch bag too.

I do bespoke orders too so please convo me if you are interested.

•	Dimensions are 27cm Wide and Height is 26cm, they fit a nice amount I use mine for a large wallet, Ipad Mini and medium sized make up bag comfortably.


Bag Materials

• Genuine Light Tan Leather, matching zip. Machine finished for security.
• Handle - 14k Gold plated 7mm heavy duty Box Chain threaded with Turquoise detailing,the handle itself is removable as it is attached through Rivets by Gold chunky Split rings.
• Attached to the handle are handmade Suede Tassels on Jump rings in Turquoise like Key Rings that can again be detached, they are colour matched to the embellishment on the bag.
• Zip Pull is a stunning large Lump of Natural Point Quartz Crystal.


Embellishment

• Heavy Ethnic Tribal Gold Metal Detail at the top under a small strip of studded Turquoise leather.
• Further down special handwoven embroidery in neon yellow,orange , turquoise & pink.
• Specially designed & hand cut non-shed Gold Glitter Fabric that has been piped with Turquoise edging, the V is surrounded by Vintage afghan beading in bright yellow and turquoise. Some Neon Orange studs at the corners of the Gold triangles and along the embroidery.
• In the Centre to finish this off is a Beautiful piece of Vintage Aquamarine & clear Rhinestone surrounded by Swarovski elements teardrop stones hand painted in various colours.


Other Details

•	Bag comes protected in a lovely green Cotton Dust bag Cover.

• The bag is unlined the quality of the leather inside is very good and allows for more room internally.

• The Handles are sturdy but the heavier & the bulkier the stuff is inside will cause the shape of the bag to alter in terms of how the embellishment will lie, if this is a problem for you careful placement of the contents will sort it out.

• Care - The leather itself is high quality and durable and embellishment is hand stitched and glued for extra security but that said these bags should be treated with love so they continue to sparkle brightly. Should a disaster occur I do offer a repair service, which is important for one off items.


PLEASE NOTE POSTAGE MAY SEEM HIGH ON THESE & SHOES BUT IT IS THE NATURE OF THE PRODUCT THEY HAVE TO BE TRACKED AND INSURED BECAUSE THEY ARE A ONE OFF AND A HIGHER PRICE IT PROTECTS BOTH OF US , ON THE PLUS SIDE IT MEANS YOU GET YOUR PARCEL WITHIN 8 DAYS BUT USUALLY WITHIN 5 WORKING DAY.
ALSO I PAY A PORTION OF THE FEE MYSELF IT IS NORMALLY AROUND £17 - £19 DEPENDING ON WEIGHT.




Designs, text and Photos © Green Eye Rocks Ltd , 2005 - 2013 - "All rights reserved"

name: Handmade Wide Leather & Glitter Statement Cuff With Repurposed Vintage.
description:
This Cuff was designed and made to go with " The Euphrosyne" Luxury bag and shoes.

Stunning Hand Made Extra wide Friendship cuff made of high quality 2mm thick Veg Tan leather, that is topped with Non Shed Pale Gold Glitter Fabric edged with Turquoise edging. 
This was embroidered with a lovely handwoven friendship bracelet, it has a repurposed Vintage Rhinestone centre piece that has been hand painted in places to match the bag. Also a couple of Swarovski elements stones in Neon Orange It also has a few small neon Swarovski crystals dotted around the bracelet.

The fastening comprises of 2 sturdy but comfortable gold plated hook fastenings to hold it nice and flat to the wrist.

Bracelet length is 17.4 cm inc the clasps, cuff width is 4.5cm, My wrist measure in at 16cm but this cuff still fits well. A little bit of give is good to be able do up and unhook clasps easily. 

STILL NOT YOUR SIZE ? It can be extended more Just convo me to let me know how much.

name: The "Thalia” Handmade - Boho Luxury embellished leather bag.
description:

Often described as Rock ‘n’ Roll Boho this stunning bag is like a beautiful piece of jewellery and is One of a Kind!

name: Statement Laser Cut Ivory Perspex Pendant with Vintage Rhinestone and Swarovski
description:
Elegant & High Fashion Long Statement Pendant in mouth watering colours that look good enough to eat! 
GreenEyerocks hand drawn design that was laser cut in Ivory perspex. 

Specially Designed laser cut perspex in Antique Ivory adorned with very high quality Swarovski Vintage teardrop stones and repurposed Clear Vintage Rhinestone. Attached to a lovely delicate Rose Gold plated rope chain.

PLEASE NOTE CHAIN MATCHES THE PLATING ON THE VINTAGE - 
If you can't live with it and prefer either Silver or gold depending on whats on there, I can change it for you just tell me at the point of purchase I want you to be really happy with your purchase XX

Pendant size is 7.4 cm long and 4cm wide at its widest points.
Total necklace length including pendant is 46 to 48.5 cm long. These Pendants Work well for any any occasion.

name: Silver Streak Vintage Rhinestone embellished Laser cut Perspex Statement Necklace
description:
" Silver Streak " Heirloom jewellery. 
For many years I have wanted to work with perspex and to incorporate  it in some way with the amazing Ernst Haeckel's - Art Forms in Nature plates and this is the result!

Specially designed laser cut perspex , 
Silver Perspex embellished with a quality piece of 1980's Rhinestone Vintage in the Centre with VERY old vintage blue trim and Swarovski Crystal elements fancy pear shaped flat back stones some painted in various shades of Blue, plus Sapphire AB, Cobalt & large Capri colour stones too!!. 

Attached to silver plated brass box chain with and extender that has a beautiful Aquamarine colour rhinestone bead & tiny turquoise bell on the end to give a necklace at the back look too!

Size of the perspex part is 14.2 cm wide and 5 cm tall.

Necklace shown on mannequin that is dress sized 10, if further details on exact sizing needed don't hesitate to email me.
© GreenEyeRocks Ltd, 2005 – 2013 “ all rights reserved”

name: Ernst Haeckel Inspired Laser cut Lucite With Vintage & Swarovski Crystal Elements
description:
The wonderful thing about the see through range is that being see through it picks up the colour of your clothing behind so it looks like the Rhinestone and crystals are just floating, they work wonderfully as an evening statement piece or casually with a plain white T...... !!!!

Specially designed laser cut perspex , clear Perspex embellished with a piece of 1985 Vintage Butler & Wilson that has a giant drop pearl on it and Swarovski Crystal elements fancy pear shaped flat back stones and Swarovski rhinestones in Emerald and Palace Green Opal. 
Attached to silver plated brass box chain with and extender that has a beautiful rhinestone bead on the end to give a necklace at the back look too!

name: Angel wings Metallic Peacock Jewel Necklace
description:
Angel Wings Metallic Peacock Heirloom Jewel Necklace.

Hand made Metallic peacock Geometric Diamond shape that was Hand embroidered with a stunning pair of vintage Milk glass and AB Rhinestone Earrings, then backed with Turquoise Blue leather and finished with Bright Blue piping. This attached to a very high quality Silver plated brass Box chain that is 5mm with a Lobster claw fastening at the back.
A bright summer statement it has good sturdy weight which means it lays nicely but is not uncomfortable.

total necklace circumference is approx 48cm

Pendant Triangle size is 6.3cm wide and 6.3cm long
Mannequin is dress size 8 - 10 UK size

© GreenEyeRocks Ltd 2005 - 2013 - "All rights reserved"

name: UK 6 - EU 39 - Boho Handmade and Hand embroidered Bright Orange Leather
description:
The Green Eye Rocks - Boho Friendship Sandal
© GreenEyeRocks Ltd 2005 - 2013 - "All rights reserved"

Stunning hand made Bright Orange leather sandals that are hand embroidered with a beautiful bright Purple, Green, Orange and Blue handwoven friendship bracelet hand embroidered with Vintage Crystal Pin Wheels in Cobalt Violet Blue, also attached to the shoe are Swarovski Crystal Elements stones in various shapes and sizes some hand painted in Neon Green.

Sizing 
--------

This pair measures inside exactly where your feet would go at 24 - 24.5 cm maximum foot width would be up to max 9 cm edge to edge at widest point.

UK - 6
Euro - 39
US - 8.5
Aus - 9

name: Paradise Carnivàle Neon Rhinestone Statement Necklace
description:
Paradise Carnivàle Neon Rhinestone Statement Collar Necklace.

From the Paradise Carnivàle a stunning Gold plated Neon collar that has been adorned with tiny gold seed bead on the bottom line, I have also added 7 stunning graduated colour rhinestone beads, at the back gold plated Brass box chain and finished off with a lobster claw fastening, Extender chain and gorgeous gold Filigree Hamsa Hand. 

A bright summer statement it has good sturdy weight which means it lays nicely but is not uncomfortable.

Mannequin is dress size 8 - 10 UK size

© GreenEyeRocks Ltd 2005 - 2013 - "All rights reserved"

Stunning hand made Beige leather sandals that are hand embroidered with a beautiful Orange , brown, beige, white and teal handwoven friendship bracelet that was hand embroidered with Vintage Crystal Pin Wheels that are milk glass white, also attached to the shoe are Swarovski Crystal Elements stones in various shapes and sizes some in blue Zircon and some hand painted in Neon Orange & Teal. Underneath each shoe at the front are 2 neon orange pom poms lined with caribbean opal stones and a gold Evil Eye under that.
